descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bo2G7hI.jpg?1[/img]
[font=Trebuchet MS][b]
[size=5]- Mod Description -[/size]

[/b][/font][b]An lore-friendly and script-free Overhaul of the Skaal village.
The knapsack by the alchemy table outside the Shaman´s hut and the storage chest by the smithy are safe to storage your supplies.
[/b]
[font=Trebuchet MS][b][size=5]- Performance -[/size][/b]

[size=3]My Rig: Asus P8B75-M/CSM Motherboard, Intel I7 2600 @ 3.4 GHz
[/size]8 Gb RAM, NVidia GTX 980TI 6 Gb, running alongside Somber 3 ENB + 1024 Textures and I get 55 FPS average.
[/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][b]- Installation -[/b][/size]

[/font]Use [color=#ff7700]NMM[/color] to install, simply double-click the mod in the "Mods" tab of [color=#ff7700]NMM[/color] after it has finished downloading or [font=Trebuchet MS][size=2][color=#f4f4f4]Download manually[/color][color=#f4f4f4] and open the .rar file. Place the DATA folder into your SKYRIM folder, click "yes" to merge folders.[/color][/size][/font] Activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp.
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4][size=2]
[/size][/color][/font][b][size=5]- Requirements -[/size][/b]

- Skyrim up to date

[font=Trebuchet MS][b][size=5]- Not Compatible Mods:[/size]

[/b][/font]- Mods that [b][color=#e69138]change[/color][/b] the [color=#e69138][b]Skaal village[/b][/color] (with the exception of texture mods)

[b][size=5]- Future Plans -[/size][/b]

add a few more details, small fixes etc.

[font=Trebuchet MS][size=5][b]- Recommended mods -
[/b][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33661/?]
[/url][/font][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72005/?]Skaal You Need - Skaal house and follower[/url][/size] by [b]Elianora.[/b] (load JKs Skaal Village.esp after that mod)[color=#f4f4f4]
[/color]
